rooms.description: A spacious minimalist living area with natural lighting and Vastu-compliant east-west orientation.
An adjoining dining space that integrates seamlessly with the living room, ensuring smooth flow of energy.
The master bedroom located in the north-east corner for positive energy as per Vastu principles. Includes ample natural light and ventilation.
A compact guest room situated adjacent to the living area with south-west orientation to balance energy flow.
The second bedroom is placed near the entrance, following Vastu guidelines for minimal disturbances and privacy.
A minimalist kitchen with streamlined storage solutions located in the south-west corner as recommended by Vastu for good energy flow.
The bathroom is strategically placed away from the main living areas to maintain privacy and positive energy distribution.
A quiet library space designed for reading and contemplation, located in a north-west corner to harness calm energy according to Vastu principles.
